items.sentence: Tom tries to avoid conflict whenever possible.
Tom lives near the hospital where he was born.
If everything's fine, then why are you crying?
It'd be best if we started again from scratch.
You don't have to get a PhD to get a good job.
Why didn't you come if you knew I needed help?
Tom deserves everything that's coming his way.
I wouldn't have done it without Tom's consent.
Tom forgot to put the milk back in the fridge.
Did last night's earthquake cause much damage?
